titleStmt.title: To JOSEPH ELLIS,Joseph Ellis (1783-1858), CD's wine merchant and proprietor of the Star and Garter Hotel, Richmond (where CD frequently dined). For CD's relations with the Ellis family see N.C. Peyrouton, "When the Wine Merchant Wrote to Dickens: The Dickens-Ellis Correspondence", Dickensian 57 (1961): 105-11. 5 DECEMBER 1848

body.p: As the safest form of remittance, I send you a cheque (crossed)CD's bank account confirms a payment of Â£52.2s.6d to Ellis on 9 December 1848 (MS Messrs Coutts). in discharge of my account.
